description:
Introducing MEC’s pinnacle of performance outerwear, the Couloir Gore-Tex Pro Jacket. It thrives in the most challenging alpine environments where every detail is critical. Rugged Gore-Text Pro construction with a water repellant finish is like wearing a suit of armour against the elements. Harness-friendly front pockets provide ample storage and double as ventilation when you want to cool down. Think of it as having your own personal climate control system. Two internal dump pockets are perfect for stashing your goggles, skins, or extra gloves, which means no more digging around in your pack. Articulated patterning means you can move freely, whether plunging an ice axe or busting out your signature victory dance at the summit.

  • Super durable 3-layer Gore-Tex Pro construction with a PFC-free DWR finish for enhanced waterproofness
  • Mico Grid Backer technology protects the inner membrane from abrasion while easily sliding over layers
  • AquaGuard® zippers and fully taped seams keeps you dry in howling conditions
  • Articulated patterning facilitates dynamic moves in mountain environments
  • Seamless shoulders prevent water from seeping through
  • Oversized front pockets with mesh lining doubles as venting when opened
  • Front pockets sit high for backpack and harness compatibility
  • 2 large internal dump pockets for goggles, skins or extra gloves
  • Contoured cuffs layer well with gloves and close with Velcro® tabs
  • Underarm vents have 2-way zippers to release heat
  • Helmet-compatible hood has embedded cordlock adjustments for a snag-free profile
  • Shock-cord adjustable hem seals out snow and drafts
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue teams to detect and locate it under snow
  • Pairs perfectly with the Couloir Gore-Tex Pro Bibs for a backcountry-ready system
name: MEC Couloir Gore-Tex Pro Jacket - Men's
